title: We're Off For Juneteenth
description: Hey, Nerd! NPR takes Juneteenth off. We'll be back Sunday with a special episode from NPR's Where We Come From series. It focuses on Emily Kwong's relationship to her heritage language and journey to learn Mandarin as an adult.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: We're Off For Juneteenth
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: See you Sunday for a special episode from Short Wave Co-Host Emily Kwong about language loss and her journey to learn Mandarin Chinese.
itunes:subtitle: See you Sunday for a special episode from Short Wave Co-Host Emily Kwong about language loss and her journey to learn Mandarin Chinese.
content:encoded: Hey, Nerd! NPR takes Juneteenth off. We'll be back Sunday with a special episode from NPR's Where We Come From series. It focuses on Emily Kwong's relationship to her heritage language and journey to learn Mandarin as an adult.
